1.content:
Every story has to begin somewhere.
What kind of Story will this be?
1.title: Beginning

11.content: Which one of these ladies will grow?
11.title: Giantess

choices: Delayed Side effect from the APTX-4869
121.content: How will Conan shrink down to an even smaller size?
121.title: Conan Edogawa

1212.content:
It was a normal day in the city of Bekia. Conan was on his way home from school when he received a text message from Haibara, she decided to stay home at school, apparently, she was close to completing a permanent antidote.

Conan ran as fast as he could to Agasa's house accidentally bumping into a few people along the way. He stooped once he passed by the gates of the Kudo Mansion. If he was going to return to his original body, then he was going to need some larger clothes.

Conan dashed inside the Mansion and grabbed his old clothes and quickly ran to the house next door. Once inside he saw Haibara standing in the middle of the living room, wearing her usual lab coat.

"So, where is it?" Conan asked.

Haibara held out her right hand, revealing a small white pill. She warned him about the potential side effects that may occur with this new antidote. Conan plucked the small pill from her hand and made his way to the bathroom. He closed the door behind him, making sure to leave it unlocked just in case something went wrong.
Conan popped the pill into his mouth and swallowed it. Instantly pain shot through his entire body and he fell to his knees clutching his heart. He let out a loud cry just before his vision went black.

Conan awoke to the sound of muffled voices. His eyes were blurry and he couldn't see straight. He rubbed his eyes now he could see clearly enough that he was still in his Conan body and that he was naked. After he rubbed the sleep from his eyes he looked around and noticed that a giant sheet was covering him with minimal light leaking through.

"What the hell is going on?" Conan pondered.
He reached out grabbed at that sheet around him, it felt like a lot like the clothes had been wearing.
He stumbled around through the strange fabric until reached the end, Conan's eyes adjusted to the light and he was shocked to see that the room had grown larger, he couldn't have been more than two inches tall.

The colossal door in front of him swung open, and a huge figure stepped through.

It was...
1212.title: Tiny Sleuth

1213.content: Professor Agasa is no stranger when it comes to inventing strange gadgets in this series before. So why not have him invent a shrink ray?
1213.title: Shrink Ray?

info.brief_description: The Girls of Detective Conan grow larger or the boys get smaller. 300 GP for good adds.
info.description:
Rules-

-Only girls are allowed to grow.
-No OC's or Crossovers.
-No one sentence chapters.
